title: Versão Acústica (album)
text: Versão Acústica is the first album by <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>ian <a href="Acoustic%20rock">Acoustic rock</a> musician <a href="Emmerson%20Nogueira">Emmerson Nogueira</a>. It features covers of hits from many famous bands and musicians, like <a href="Pink%20Floyd">Pink Floyd</a>, <a href="Eric%20Clapton">Eric Clapton</a>, <a href="Deep%20Purple">Deep Purple</a> and <a href="Simon%20%26amp%3B%20Garfunkel">Simon & Garfunkel</a>.
